snippet: General Motors Co has appointed an outside law firm to investigate its legal department, which is under fire for its role in the company's mishandled ignition switch recall, the automaker's top lawyer will announce at a Senate hearing....

headline.print_headline: GM to Review, Reorganize Legal Dept in Response to Recall
headline.main: GM to Review, Reorganize Legal Dept in Response to Recall

lead_paragraph: General Motors Co has appointed an outside law firm to investigate its legal department, which is under fire for its role in the company's mishandled ignition switch recall, the automaker's top lawyer will announce at a Senate hearing.
